thread.title: Montgomery county raises money for veterans cemetery project
thread.title_full: Montgomery county raises money for veterans cemetery project - FOX 8 WVUE New Orleans News, Weather, Sports, Social

author: cbs8
title: Montgomery county raises money for veterans cemetery project
text:
KILMICHAEL, Miss. (AP) - Montgomery County is about halfway to its goal of raising enough money to build a grand entrance to a new veterans cemetery under construction in Kilmichael.
WTVA TV reports ( http://bit.ly/1kz2zb5 ) county supervisors said this week the Mississippi Development Authority and the Mississippi Department of Transportation each have provided $150,000 grants for the project.
That's $300,000 of the estimated $542,000 needed for the project.
Almost $7 million in federal money is paying for the majority of the new cemetery but the entrance was not included.
Local leaders also are raising money for a tower that will play music during funerals and other ceremonies.
The cemetery is expected to host its first funeral in about 18 months.
Information from: WTVA-TV, http://www.wtva.com
